an7.8:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these seven fetters.[n.457]Satta saṁyojanāni. The familiar scheme of ten fetters occurs in AN only inAN0.3.What seven? The fetter of compliance,[n.458]Anunayasaṁyojanaṁ. An unusual listing among the fetters.Mpglosses it as the fetter of sensual lust(kāmarāgasaṁyojanaṁ).the fetter of aversion, the fetter of views, the fetter of doubt, the fetter of conceit, the fetter of lust for existence, and the fetter of ignorance. These are the seven fetters."
